ISSUE.TITLE: Token renewal button breaks "example projects curl"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** A clear and concise description of what the bug is. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to local UI 2. Click on Account and Settings 3. Scroll down to 'Example fetch projects data:' 4. Click "refresh" on the token 5. Copy and paste example fetch curl into terminal **Expected behavior** Should get the projects, instead get error because the curl is incorrectly formatted **Screenshots** the closing quote comes after `Token` instead of after the actual token **Environment (please complete the following information):** - OS: [e.g. iOS] MacOS - Label Studio Version [e.g. 0.8.0] `1.6.0` **Additional context** The error only happens after refreshing the token https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22605641/193113632-f010771f-5fd9-4c60-b58e-6f17bc7abf52.mov
